transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Sir, main aapke saath baat kar rahi thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yes sir, main Vanchika baat kar rahi thi aapke saath IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: IndiaMART se main baat kar rahi thi, aapki service ke related, main Vanchika ji.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Yes sir, thoda service ke baare mein mujhe discussion karna tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan sir, jaise hamara last time discussion hua tha, aapke paas thoda buyleads ka problem tha.
Aapke paas aapke clients ki call vagerah nahi aa rahi thi.
Customer: Kya bol rahe hain?
Executive: Sir, aapko last time problem kya na, issue tha aapko ki aapke paas jo delivering lead ho rahi thi, vo aapke paas nahi aa rahi thi, hai na?
Customer: Abhi [inaudible].
Executive: Call back karta hu ji.
Executive: To kis time pe main call karu, aap mujhe ek baar bata dijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had buylead issues.

- Not receiving calls from clients.



Resolution:

- Executive wanted to discuss service issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, service, client calls
